deleghe.title: Delegates
deleghe.description: Here, you can manage your delegates and delegations. The former are the natural or legal persons you have authorised to view and manage your notifications, the latter are those who have authorised you.
deleghe.delegatorsTitle: Delegations to be borne by you
deleghe.delegatorsApiErrorMessage: We were unable to retrieve the delegation data for you.
deleghe.empty_state: You have not delegated anyone to view your notifications.
deleghe.accept_description: To accept the proxy, enter the code {{name}} shared with you.
deleghe.revocation_question: Do you really want to revoke the delegation?
deleghe.rejection_question: Do you really want to decline the delegation?
deleghe.error_subtitle: We were unable to load the page. Reload it, or try again later.
deleghe.no_delegates: You have not delegated anyone to view your notifications.
deleghe.show_code_subtitle: Share this code with the delegate: they will have to enter it when accepting the delegation.

nuovaDelega.createdTitle: Your delegation request has been successfully created
nuovaDelega.createdDescription: Share the verification code with the delegate: they will have to enter it on the first login to SEND and accept your request.
nuovaDelega.title: Your delegations
nuovaDelega.subtitle: Enter the data of the legal entity to which you want to delegate the management of your notifications

form.verificationCodeDescr: Share this code with the delegate: they will have to enter it when accepting the delegation.

fiscalCode.wrong: The Tax Code entered is incorrect

expirationDate.required: The delegation end date is required

already_exists.title: Delegation already present
already_exists.message: The person you indicated already has a delegate for this organisation.

not_acceptable.title: Delegation is invalid
not_acceptable.message: The delegation entered is not valid

fiscal_code.title: Invalid tax code
fiscal_code.message: The tax code entered is not valid

invalid_parameter.title: Invalid data
invalid_parameter.message: One or more of the data entered is invalid
